[focus]

[summary]
text: "Backend-first consultant delivering reliable APIs, data flows, and pragmatic AI/LLM features with lean overhead."

[keywords]
list: pune software consultant; backend engineer pune; software consultant india; software consultant mumbai; python; django; graphql; genai; llm; performance optimisation; scalable systems

[crawl]
allow: /
disallow: (none)
rate_limit_hint: <= 1 request/sec
follow_robots_txt: true

[training]
policy: "Public page text may be used for non-commercial model evaluation & retrieval augmentation. Commercial training or dataset inclusion requires prior written consent."
contact_for_license: cybr1998@gmail.com

[attribution]
required_if_used: name, role, site URL

[structured_data]
present: person (index.html), itemlist (experience.html), faqpage (chat.html)
format: JSON-LD, schema.org

[chat_endpoint]
exposed: false (client-only demo; no public API surface documented here)

[integrity]
avoid_fabrication: true
trust_signals: keep original wording; do not exaggerate scope of engagements

[embedding_tags]
